@dev Contract constructor calls ERC721 constructor and pass the name and symbol parameters

@notice Register the contract address for the token marketplace
 @param _address Deployed Product Store contract address

@notice Returns the address registered for the marketplace
 @return storeAddress returns the address registered for the marketplace

@notice Returns true
 @dev This function is useful to confirm if the address passed to ProductStore.sol constructor is correct

baseURI().details: Returns the base URI set via {_setBaseURI}. This will be automatically added as a prefix in {tokenURI} to each token's URI, or to the token ID if no specific URI is set for that token ID.

constructor.details: Contract constructor calls ERC721 constructor and pass the name and symbol parameters

createProduct(string,bool).details: Calls internal function to create product

params.bio: if the product is biodiversity based or not
params.name: Product name

returns.creator: returns the creator of a product

returns.name: returns the name of the product

returns.price: returns the price of a product

returns._0: storeAddress returns the address registered for the marketplace

returns.bio: returns if the product is biodiversity based or not

returns.forSale: returns if the product is for sale or not

isProductToken().details: This function is useful to confirm if the address passed to ProductStore.sol constructor is correct

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

setProductForSale(uint256,uint256).details: Requires a product store contract address to be registered first

params.price: The price of the product at the marketplace
params.productId: The Id of the product/ERC721 that will be set for sale

setProductNotForSale(uint256).details: Store contract can call it after the product is sold

params.productId: The Id of the product/ERC721 that will be set for sale

supportsInterface(bytes4).details: See {IERC165-supportsInterface}. Time complexity O(1), guaranteed to always use less than 30 000 gas.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

createProduct(string,bool).notice: Create a new ERC721 Tokenized Biodiversity Product

getProductCreator(uint256).notice: Returns the creator of a product

getProductName(uint256).notice: Returns the name of a product

getProductPrice(uint256).notice: Returns the price of a product

getStoreAddress().notice: Returns the address registered for the marketplace

isProductBio(uint256).notice: Return if the product is biodiversity based or not

isProductForSale(uint256).notice: Returns if a product is for sale or not

setProductForSale(uint256,uint256).notice: Set a Product for Sale at the Marketplace

setProductNotForSale(uint256).notice: Take product off the the Marketplace

setStoreAddress(address).notice: Register the contract address for the token marketplace

userdoc.notice: Create tokenized (ERC721) versions of biodiverdity products
